TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SendMessageChannelCache extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable
Public NotInheritable Class SendMessageChannelCache Implements IDisposable
public ref class SendMessageChannelCache sealed : IDisposable

summary.span: 代表擴充，這個擴充能讓您自訂快取共用層級、通道處理站快取的設定，以及使用 傳訊活動傳送訊息至服務端點的工作流程之通道快取的設定。

span.span: Represents an extension that enables the customization of the cache sharing levels, the settings of the channel factory cache, and the settings of the channel cache for workflows that send messages to service endpoints using messaging activities.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別適用於將訊息傳送至服務端點的工作流程。This class is intended for workflows that send messages to service endpoints. 這些工作流程通常是用戶端工作流程，但也可以是裝載於 中的工作流程服務。These workflows are typically client workflows but could also be workflow services that are hosted in a . 根據預設，在 所裝載的工作流程中， 中的所有工作流程執行個體會共用 傳訊活動使用的快取 (主機層級快取)。By default, in a workflow hosted by a , the cache used by messaging activities is shared across all workflow instances in the (host-level caching). 針對並非由 裝載的用戶端工作流程，快取只能供工作流程執行個體使用 (執行個體層級快取)。For a client workflow that is not hosted by a , the cache is available only to the workflow instance (instance-level caching). 工作流程中的傳送活動若在組態中定義了端點，快取會依預設停用。Caching is disabled by default for any send activity in your workflow that has endpoints defined in configuration. 如需如何變更預設快取共用層級以及通道處理站和通道快取的快取設定的詳細資訊，請參閱[變更傳送活動的快取共用層級](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/changing-the-cache-sharing-levels-for-send-activities.md)。For more information about how to change the default cache sharing levels and cache settings for the channel factory and channel cache, see [Changing the Cache Sharing Levels for Send Activities](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/changing-the-cache-sharing-levels-for-send-activities.md). ## Examples 下列範例將示範如何使用 類別，在單一應用程式定義域中共用兩個工作流程應用程式之間的通道快取。The following example shows how to use the class to share a channel cache between two workflow applications in a single app domain. [!code-csharp[ChannelCache#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/channelcache/cs/client.cs#0)]

summary.span: 使用自訂的處理站快取和通道快取設定，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with custom factory cache and channel cache settings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需通道處理站的詳細資訊，請參閱 和 。For more information about channel factories, see and . 您可以選擇只使用通道處理站快取並停用通道快取，方法是將 `channelSettings` 參數傳遞至這個已初始化為 執行個體的建構函式，其 值為 0。You can choose to use only the channel factory cache and disable the channel cache by passing the `channelSettings` parameter to this constructor initialized to a instance with a value of 0. 若要完全停用通道處理站快取和通道快取，請將 `factorySettings` 參數傳遞至這個已初始化為 執行個體的建構函式，其 值為 0。To disable the cache completely for both the channel factory cache and the channel cache, pass the `factorySettings` parameter to this constructor initialized to a instance with a value of 0. 請注意，如果停用通道處理站快取，您就無法開啟通道快取。Note that you cannot turn the channel cache on if the channel factory cache is disabled. ## Examples 下列範例將示範如何使用 類別，在單一應用程式定義域中共用兩個工作流程應用程式之間的通道快取。The following example shows how to use the class to share a channel cache between two workflow applications in a single app domain. [!code-csharp[ChannelCache#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/channelcache/cs/client.cs#0)]

summary.span: 使用自訂處理站快取設定、自訂通道快取設定，以及指出是否要開啟快取的值，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with custom factory cache settings, custom channel cache settings, and a value that indicates whether to turn caching on.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，快取只會供不使用組態所定義端點的 活動使用。By default, the cache is only available for activities that don’t use endpoints defined in configuration. 不過，如果您想要開啟快取在此情況下呼叫這個建構函式`allowUnsafeCaching`參數設定為`true`。However, if you want to turn caching on in this case call this constructor with the `allowUnsafeCaching` parameter set to `true`. 接著，請將這個類別的新執行個體加入工作流程服務主機或工作流程執行個體，做為擴充。Next, add the new instance of this class as an extension to a workflow service host or a workflow instance. 如需通道處理站的詳細資訊，請參閱 和 。For more information about channel factories, see and .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AllowUnsafeCaching { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值會指出是否要開啟快取功能。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to turn caching on.

value.span: 表示要開啟快取功能，否則為 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果工作流程中的 活動的組態已定義端點，快取可能不安全，因此快取功能會依預設停用。If the activity in your workflow has endpoints defined in configuration caching could be unsecure and therefore is disabled by default. 不過，如果您想要開啟快取上設定此屬性為`true`。However, if you want to turn caching on set this property to `true`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通道處理站快取代表快取的通道處理站。The channel factory cache represents cached channel factories. 如需通道處理站的詳細資訊，請參閱 和 。For more information about channel factories, see and .
